newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Cricket-West Indies 196 for seven v Australia.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Cricket-West Indies 196 for seven v Australia.

text.p: Curtly Ambrose was run out cheaply for West Indies to be 196 for seven with four overs remaining in their limited overs match against Australia A at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on Friday.
Ambrose made only one before being sent back by batting partner Jimmy Adams as he attempted a second run.
Ambrose fell six runs after West Indies lost Shivnarine Chanderpaul for 72.
Adams was 21 not out and the new batsman was Ian Bishop.
